caption.title: Simulation of epidemics.
caption.p: Simulated influenza clinical cases (red line) were obtained from the average of 300 simulations (gray line). Processed real epidemic (blue line) is the actual epidemic timeline, from data collected from hospitals in Forsyth Country. (a) 2009–2010 influenza season, (b) 2010–2011 influenza season, and (c) 2011–2012 influenza season.
